title: Support browse for folder using OpenFileDialog
body: There is no replacement for the outdated SHBrowseForFolder used in Windows Forms.

comments.body:
It is amazing that you cant use the OpenFileDialog to browse for a folder/directory/path.
The Win Forms FolderBrowserDialog is the most hated dialog in my opinion.
Folder Selecting/Opening needs to be added to the Win32 OpenFileDialog. It has shortcuts to your Quick Access folders and Libraries etc...
